thread.section_title: ClearBags Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ClearBags | clearbags.com | 17 of 484
thread.title: Reynaldo

author: Reynaldo
title: Reynaldo
text:
This is with regards to the negative review I posted for CLEARBAGS. I'm reversing the NEGATIVE to POSITIVE review, as the customers service of Clearbags, responded immediately to my attention regarding my complaint on, Tricky Description. It was a misunderstanding of description, between CD Business card clear bag to CD sleeve.
Ellyse, the costumers service manager, was considerately understanding to where I stood. It was a misinterpretation of the AD as advertised. She refunded my money back to my account, in full. Very PROFESSIONAL and CARING for customers being. I will do business with this company even in a very small scale, for the reason of Professionalism in dealing with customers. Please post this reversal review for viewers to read. Much appreciated and thank you.
Satisfied customer,
Reynaldo Padua
